description: Regional Initiative on Indigenous Peoples’ Rights & Development (RIPP), Phase II

subproject.description: Government officials and representatives of indigenous peoples with knowledge and skills to effectively dialogue and cooperate in implementing inclusive and equitable governance
subproject.title: RIPP-Inclusive Dialogue

subproject.description: Government officials and representatives of indigenous peoples with knowledge and skills to effectively dialogue and cooperate in implementing inclusive and equitable governance
subproject.title: RIPP-Inclusive Dialogue

subproject.description:
Output 1. Staff of government ministries, national institutions and indigenous peoples’ organizations have knowledge and skills to integrate indigenous peoples’ rights into national policy and strategies
Output 2.      Indigenous leaders, women and youth better able to participate in regional and national policy and decision-making processes.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: RIPP-Intern'l Norms & Standard
